Great quality, genuine product, looks nice... Worth buying

This analog watch for men has a white dial featuring plain three hands and
slanted markings at five minute intervals. The dial is enclosed in a silver-
coloured case with a crown that lets you adjust the time. The brown leather
strap is fitted with a buckle closure that ensures maximum comfort and
security for the watch. Equipped with a 5 ATM water resistance feature, the
timepiece is user-friendly. It comes with a 24-month warranty.  
the watch is little bulky and weighty but after some days of wearing it get
comfortable. an extreamly stylish as well as classy looking product from
fastrack.

This product gives very nice look with reasonable price.  
Bought 6-7 month back and it is working nicely.
